title: [PBE] VisualUpdate dello SHOP
body:
Fonte : [Surrender@20](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2016/02/red-post-collection-february-early.html)

Ecco le prime immagini relative alla nuova interfaccia dello SHOP nel client, da poco approdata sulla PBE:

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/3267/5473/original.jpg

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/3267/5474/original.jpg

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/3267/5475/original.jpg

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/3267/5478/original.jpg

http://a.disquscdn.com/uploads/mediaembed/images/3267/5480/original.jpg



A quanto pare, la nostra Katarina ballerina non ci farà più compagnia negli acquisti.

http://i.imgur.com/QRUPiHQ.gif  

R.I.P. {{champion:32}}

replies.body: Mi sono sempre chiesto quale fosse il senso metaforico, e per un certo senso idilliaco, di quelle movenze "SENZAZIONALI" (Cit. Dj sona) di Katarina nello shop. Guardandola adesso come Gif si capisce che il vero scopo è un mero lavaggio del cervello. Se notate bene ci sono tre 6 che si muovono uno affianco all'altro. http://i.imgur.com/ScnZvba.gif?noredirect

She was there in our darkest times...
She was there, when we thought we would be alone and forgotton...
She was there, when everyone else left us...
She was there, when we spend the last RP on our Teemo skin...
She was there, when we bought ourselves champions for RP...
She was there, when we bought ourselves skins that were on sale the next day...
She was there, when we bought Nunu Bot to untilt us...
She was there, when we needed a friend...
She was there, when our payment took years to complete...
She was there for us, no matter when or why

Rest in peperonies...... Dancing Katarina ;-;

                                  http://i.imgur.com/QRUPiHQ.gif
